Third Person perspective Taking reveals blindspots

Last updated on July 4, 2021

Third-person perspective-taking helps identify flaws in reasoning. Conversational interfaces around one’s knowledge base force third-person perspective-taking by design, helping one reduce bias. However, first-person projection also has its advantages.
